item.title: Officials: Beware of Scams When Donating to LA Fire Victims
item.description: Scammers are targeting people making donation to help the victims of the Los Angeles wildfires, California Attorney General Rob Bonta warned Saturday.

item.title: Sen. Capito: Two-Bill Approach Makes More Sense

item.title: LA Mayor Bass Vowed Not to Travel Abroad; She Did
item.description: When Karen Bass was campaigning in 2021 to be the mayor of Los Angeles, she vowed not to travel abroad, The New York Times reported.
